concept.title: Manifest block limitations
concept.shortdesc: Exported resources are not supported in manifest blocks. You must pass exported resources directly instead of exporting and collecting them from . If you need to interact with resources managed during a normal run, use the function puppetdb_query.

conbody.p:
In addition, the following top-level variables, which exist in normal catalog compilation, are not included during manifest block compilation:
$server_facts
master variables like $servername
$environment
You can optionally set these from a target's vars, but they don't have defaults in .
